item.title: The Wonderful Ones
item.description: The Opera TV Browser, optimized for ease of use and long-tail content on Linux and Android based TVs, set-top boxes and Media- players, is built on OperaÂ´s experience of bringing web browsing to 250 million mobile and PC-users world wide.

item.title: Designer Pain
item.description: Check out the latest news and features in Opera Mini and Opera Mobile! Features include: - WebGL for Opera Mobile - A brand new smart screen - Unlimited Speed Dials!
